          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Kan du det här på svenska? 4</string>
            <string language="en">Can you do this in English? 4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Können Sie dies auf englisch tun? 4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pouvez-vous faire ceci en anglais ? 4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pode você fazer este em inglês? 4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potete fare questo in inglese? 4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπορείτε να κάνετε αυτό στα αγγλικά; 4</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Puede usted hacer esto en inglés? 4</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här kan kursdeltagaren dels bocka av uppnådda modulmål, dels fundera lite över bland annat egeninsats.Modul 4 - Hur bor du? - Kan du det här? 4Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here, the course participants, tick of the achieved modulmål, and reflect a little more than including egeninsats. Module 4 - How do you live? - Can you do this? 4 Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">mål</string>
            <string language="sv">utvärdering</string>
            <string language="sv">egen bedömning</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">sfi</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">target</string>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
            <string language="en">own assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier reflektieren die Kursteilnehmer, Häckchen 
des erzielten modulmål und wenig mehr als einschließlich egeninsats.
Modul 4 - Wie leben Sie? - können Sie dies tun? 
4 Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici, les participants aux cours, coutil du 
modulmål réalisé, et reflètent peu un plus que comprenant des 
egeninsats. Module 4 - Comment vivez-vous ? - 
pouvez-vous faire ceci ? 4 Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui, os participants do curso, tiquetaque do 
modulmål conseguido, e refletem um pouco mais do que including 
egeninsats. Módulo 4 - Como você vive? - pode 
você fazer este? 4 Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui, i partecipanti ai corsi, battito del 
modulmål realizzato e riflettono poco un più di compreso i 
egeninsats. Modulo 4 - Come vivete? - potete fare 
questo? 4 Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ, οι συμμετέχοντες σειράς μαθημάτων, κρότωνας του 
πραγματοποιημένου modulmεl, και απεικονίζουν λίγο περισσότερο 
απ' ό,τι συμπεριλαμβανομένου egeninsats. Ενότητα 4 - πώς 
ζείτε; - Μπορείτε να κάνετε αυτό; 4 Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí, los participantes del curso, señal del 
modulmål alcanzado, y reflejan poco más que incluyendo egeninsats. 
Módulo 4 - ¿Cómo usted vive? ¿- puede usted hacer 
esto? 4 Safir.</string>
          </description>
